subtitle: A delightful combination is champagne and strawberries but have you ever tried it in the form of a refreshing jelly?

method.text: Dissolve the gelatine in the boiling water. Stir in the sugar. Pour into a large jug. Allow to cool but not set.
Put 3 strawberries in each glass and chill.
Pour the chilled wine or Champagne into the gelatine liquid. Allow the froth to settle. Gently pour this into the chilled glasses - don't worry as the strawberries will float.
Refrigerate for at least 1 days or until set.

title: Champagne and strawberry jelly
